00041 
00042 int TCPSerializer::serialize(const TCPSegment *tcpseg,
00043         unsigned char *buf, unsigned int bufsize)
00044 {
00045     ASSERT(buf);
00046     ASSERT(tcpseg);
00047     //cMessage* cmsg;
00048     struct tcphdr *tcp = (struct tcphdr*) (buf);
00049     //int writtenbytes = sizeof(struct tcphdr)+tcpseg->payloadLength();
00050     int writtenbytes = tcpseg->getByteLength();
00051 
00052     // fill TCP header structure
00053     tcp->th_sum = 0;
00054     tcp->th_sport = htons(tcpseg->getSrcPort());
00055     tcp->th_dport = htons(tcpseg->getDestPort());
00056     tcp->th_seq = htonl(tcpseg->getSequenceNo());
00057     tcp->th_ack = htonl(tcpseg->getAckNo());
00058     tcp->th_offs = TCP_HEADER_OCTETS / 4;
00059 
00060     // set flags
00061     unsigned char flags = 0;
00062     if(tcpseg->getFinBit())
00063         flags |= TH_FIN;
00064     if(tcpseg->getSynBit())
00065         flags |= TH_SYN;
00066     if(tcpseg->getRstBit())
00067         flags |= TH_RST;
00068     if(tcpseg->getPshBit())
00069         flags |= TH_PUSH;
00070     if(tcpseg->getAckBit())
00071         flags |= TH_ACK;
00072     if(tcpseg->getUrgBit())
00073         flags |= TH_URG;
00074     tcp->th_flags = (TH_FLAGS & flags);
00075     tcp->th_win = htons(tcpseg->getWindow());
00076     tcp->th_urp = htons(tcpseg->getUrgentPointer());
00077 
00078     unsigned short numOptions = tcpseg->getOptionsArraySize();
00079     unsigned int lengthCounter = 0;
00080     unsigned char * options = (unsigned char * )tcp->th_options;
00081     if (numOptions > 0) // options present?
00082     {
00083         unsigned int maxOptLength = tcpseg->getHeaderLength()-TCP_HEADER_OCTETS;
00084 
00085         for (unsigned short i=0; i < numOptions; i++)
00086         {
00087             TCPOption option = tcpseg->getOptions(i);
00088             unsigned short kind = option.getKind();
00089             unsigned short length = option.getLength(); // length >= 1
00090             options = ((unsigned char * )tcp->th_options)+lengthCounter;
00091 
00092             lengthCounter += length;
00093 
00094             ASSERT(lengthCounter <= maxOptLength);
00095 
00096             options[0] = kind;
00097             if(length>1)
00098             {
00099                 options[1] = length;
00100             }
00101             unsigned int optlen = option.getValuesArraySize();
00102             for(unsigned int k=0; k<optlen; k++)
00103             {
00104                 unsigned int value = option.getValues(k);
00105                 unsigned int p0 = 2 + 4*k;
00106                 for (unsigned int p = std::min((unsigned int)length-1, 5 + 4*k); p >= p0; p--)
00107                 {
00108                     options[p] = value & 0xFF;
00109                     value = value >> 8;
00110                 }
00111             }
00112         } // for
00113         //padding:
00114         options = (unsigned char * )(tcp->th_options);
00115         while (lengthCounter % 4)
00116             options[lengthCounter++] = 0;
00117 
00118         ASSERT(TCP_HEADER_OCTETS+lengthCounter <= TCP_MAX_HEADER_OCTETS);
00119         tcp->th_offs = (TCP_HEADER_OCTETS+lengthCounter)/4; // TCP_HEADER_OCTETS = 20
00120     } // if options present
00121 
00122     // write data
00123     if (tcpseg->getByteLength() > tcpseg->getHeaderLength()) // data present? FIXME TODO: || tcpseg->getEncapsulatedMsg()!=NULL
00124     {
00125         unsigned int dataLength = tcpseg->getByteLength() - tcpseg->getHeaderLength();
00126         // TCPPayloadMessage *tcpP = check_and_cast<TCPPayloadMessage* >(tcpseg->getEncapsulatedMsg()); // FIXME
00127         char *tcpData = (char *)options+lengthCounter;
00128         memset(tcpData, 't', dataLength); // fill data part with 't'
00129         /*
00130         for (unsigned int i=0; i < dataLength; i++)
00131         {
00132             if (i < tcpseg->getPayloadArraySize())
00133             {
00134 //              tcpData[i] = (unsigned char) tcpP.msg; // FIXME
00135                 tcpData[i] = 't'; // FIXME - write 't' as dummy data
00136             }
00137             else
00138                 {tcpData[i] = 't';} // write 't' as dummy data
00139         }
00140         */
00141     }
00142     return writtenbytes;
00143 }
00144 
00145 int TCPSerializer::serialize(const TCPSegment *tcpseg,
00146         unsigned char *buf, unsigned int bufsize,
00147         const IPvXAddress &srcIp, const IPvXAddress &destIp)
00148 {
00149     int writtenbytes = serialize(tcpseg, buf, bufsize);
00150     struct tcphdr *tcp = (struct tcphdr*) (buf);
00151     tcp->th_sum = checksum(tcp, writtenbytes, srcIp, destIp);
00152 
00153     return writtenbytes;
00154 }
00155 
00156 void TCPSerializer::parse(const unsigned char *buf, unsigned int bufsize, TCPSegment *tcpseg)
00157 {
00158     ASSERT(buf);
00159     ASSERT(tcpseg);
00160     struct tcphdr const * const tcp = (struct tcphdr * const ) (buf);
00161 
00162     // fill TCP header structure
00163     tcpseg->setSrcPort(ntohs(tcp->th_sport));
00164     tcpseg->setDestPort(ntohs(tcp->th_dport));
00165     tcpseg->setSequenceNo(ntohl(tcp->th_seq));
00166     tcpseg->setAckNo(ntohl(tcp->th_ack));
00167     unsigned short hdrLength =tcp->th_offs * 4;
00168     tcpseg->setHeaderLength(hdrLength);
00169 
00170     // set flags
00171     unsigned char flags = tcp->th_flags;
00172     if ((flags & TH_FIN) == TH_FIN)
00173         tcpseg->setFinBit(true);
00174     if ((flags & TH_SYN) == TH_SYN)
00175         tcpseg->setSynBit(true);
00176     if ((flags & TH_RST) == TH_RST)
00177         tcpseg->setRstBit(true);
00178     if ((flags & TH_PUSH) == TH_PUSH)
00179         tcpseg->setPshBit(true);
00180     if ((flags & TH_ACK) == TH_ACK)
00181         tcpseg->setAckBit(true);
00182     if ((flags & TH_URG) == TH_URG)
00183         tcpseg->setUrgBit(true);
00184 
00185     tcpseg->setWindow(ntohs(tcp->th_win));
00186     // Checksum (header checksum): modelled by cMessage::hasBitError()
00187     tcpseg->setUrgentPointer(ntohs(tcp->th_urp));
00188 
00189     if (hdrLength > TCP_HEADER_OCTETS) // options present?
00190     {
00191         unsigned short optionBytes = hdrLength - TCP_HEADER_OCTETS; // TCP_HEADER_OCTETS = 20
00192         unsigned short optionsCounter = 0; // index for tcpseg->setOptions[]
00193 
00194         unsigned short length = 0;
00195         for (unsigned short j=0; j<optionBytes; j+=length)
00196         {
00197             unsigned char * options = ((unsigned char * )tcp->th_options)+j;
00198             unsigned short kind = options[0];
00199             length = options[1];
00200 
00201             TCPOption tmpOption;
00202             switch(kind)
00203             {
00204                 case TCPOPTION_END_OF_OPTION_LIST: // EOL
00205                 case TCPOPTION_NO_OPERATION: // NOP
00206                     length = 1;
00207                     break;
00208 
00209                 default:
00210                     break;
00211             } // switch
00212 
00213             // kind
00214             tmpOption.setKind(kind);
00215             // length
00216             tmpOption.setLength(length);
00217             // value
00218             int optlen = (length+1)/4;
00219             tmpOption.setValuesArraySize(optlen);
00220             for (short int k=0; k<optlen; k++)
00221             {
00222                 unsigned int value = 0;
00223                 for (short int l=2+4*k; l<length && l<6+4*k; l++)
00224                 {
00225                     value = (value << 8) + options[l];
00226                 }
00227                 tmpOption.setValues(k, value);
00228             }
00229             // write option to tcp header
00230             tcpseg->setOptionsArraySize(tcpseg->getOptionsArraySize()+1);
00231             tcpseg->setOptions(optionsCounter,tmpOption);
00232             optionsCounter++;
00233         } // for j
00234     } // if options present
00235 
00236     tcpseg->setByteLength(bufsize);
00237     tcpseg->setPayloadLength(bufsize - tcpseg->getHeaderLength());
00238 }
00239 
00240 uint16_t TCPSerializer::checksum(const void *addr, unsigned int count,
00241         const IPvXAddress &srcIp, const IPvXAddress &destIp)
00242 {
00243     uint32_t sum = TCPIPchecksum::_checksum(addr, count);
00244 
00245     ASSERT(srcIp.wordCount() == destIp.wordCount());
00246 
00247     //sum += srcip;
00248     sum += htons(TCPIPchecksum::_checksum(srcIp.words(), sizeof(uint32)*srcIp.wordCount()));
00249 
00250     //sum += destip;
00251     sum += htons(TCPIPchecksum::_checksum(destIp.words(), sizeof(uint32)*destIp.wordCount()));
00252 
00253     sum += htons(count); // TCP length
00254 
00255     sum += htons(IP_PROT_TCP); // PTCL
00256 
00257     while (sum >> 16)
00258         sum = (sum & 0xFFFF) + (sum >> 16);
00259 
00260     return (uint16_t)~sum;
00261 }
